meaning_str.bing:
n. 战斗；战役；战争；斗争
v. 斗争；竞争；抗争；奋斗
网络. 作战；战场

战斗；战役；战争；会战；交战；斗争；争斗；奋斗；搏斗；竞争；冲突；较量
战斗；搏斗；斗争；竞争；争夺；反抗；对抗；奋战

1.en: Apparently, your journey took a negative turn when you let go of being an angel and engaged yourself in a battle with the dark forces.
1.cn: 显然，你的旅程当你放弃成为一个天使存在的时候踏入了一个负面的转变，约定了自己经历与黑暗力量的斗争。

2.en: And just a week and a half after the fatal incident, as residents demand safer streets, Chicago faces a new battle -- this time over guns.
2.cn: 这起殴打致死事件发生后一周半之后，居民们要求安全的环境芝加哥因此又面临着一场新的战役---这次是针对枪而言。

3.en: Of course, she is not the only one in the family to battle with her shape - her mother has endured a life-long struggle to manage weight.
3.cn: 当然，她不是家族中唯一一个决心重塑身材的人-她的母亲坚持毕生的精力努力保持体形。

0.en: Defeated in battle. Is this to be my legacy?
0.cn: "在战斗中被击败"，这就是我的遗赠？

1.en: Have you spent much time in battle, sir? That's immaterial.
1.cn: 你到底经历过真刀真枪的战斗吗？这无关紧要。

2.en: Caine was the best soldier I ever went into battle with.
2.cn: 凯恩是我在战斗中见过最好的士兵。

3.en: If you can't do it here, I can't trust you to do it in the battle.
3.cn: 你若在此做不到，我不信你在战斗能做到。

4.en: Here's the deal, snot. When we go into battle, you will not pass through the gates until all my soldiers are through.
4.cn: 咱们这么着，废物，参加战斗时，我的战士全都进场之后，你才能进入战斗室。

5.en: And now you will fly to him. And you will battle him. To the death. Black and blue. Fight night!
5.cn: 而现在你要飞去找他，去和他战斗，至死方休，蓝与黑，决战之夜！

6.en: The world was at war. And alliances were forged in battle and were made stronger because of that.
6.cn: 世界爆发了大战，一些国家在战斗中结成了同盟，也因此而变得更加强大。

7.en: Private Doss, you are free to run into the hell fire of battle without a single weapon to protect yourself.
7.cn: 列兵多斯，你可自由的投入战斗的地狱烈火无需任何武器保护自己。

8.en: Let all of Panem come together, not to battle for the amusement of the Capitol, but to join hands in this fight.
8.cn: 让我们帕纳姆国团结一心，不为寻求报复国会区的快感，只为共同战斗。

9.en: Very well. Top test scores in class. Highest Battle Room ratings. But you have a habit of upsetting your commander.
9.cn: 非常好，考试成绩名列前茅，战斗得分也是第一，但你好像总是惹你的长官生气。

10.en: Dear Valentine. So this is Battle School. Every day, hours of training. And far more homework than we ever had on Earth.
10.cn: 亲爱的华伦蒂，战斗学校的生活开始了，每天都有数小时训练，还有比从前在地球上多得多的作业。

11.en: Really? He's swimming, giving it all he's got and then three gigantic sharks capture him and he blows them up and dives thousands of feet and gets chased by a monster with huge teeth! He ties this demon to a rock, and what's his reward? He gets to battle an entire jellyfish forest! Now he's with a bunch of sea turtles on the E.A. C and the word is he's headed this way right now to Sydney!
11.cn: 真的? 他追啊追,不顾一切得追，突然三条鲨鱼碰到了他，他炸飞了他们，然后潜到了几千英尺下面又被长着巨大牙齿的怪兽追捕! 他把那个怪兽绑在了岩石上, 他得到了什么奖赏呢? 他和整个水母群战斗! 现在他正和一群海龟在东流上顺着东澳暖流直奔悉尼!

12.en: No way to get inside without a battle.
12.cn: 要进去，势必得大战一场。

13.en: Before the battle of the fist comes the battle of the mind. Hence, the dramatic entrance.
13.cn: 双方交战先比气势，后比拳头，因此，出场就是要华丽。

14.en: And they were having a battle for 20, 30 years. Really?
14.cn: 两方的争斗持续了二三十年。真的吗？

15.en: Set your house in order, and dig in for the battle to survive.
15.cn: 安顿好你的船，准备打场持久战。

16.en: But in the wars final days, one Autobot ship escaped the battle.
16.cn: 但在战争结束之前，一艘汽车人战舰逃离了战场。

17.en: And in the midst of that decisive battle, a legendary hero emerged.
17.cn: 而在决战中，一名传奇英雄诞生了。

18.en: My son, Jingim, just stated that they are ready to ride into battle.
18.cn: 我儿真金刚刚已经说了他们已经做好作战的准备。

19.en: Welcome to Battle School. A great responsibility rests upon each of you.
19.cn: 欢迎来到作战学院，你们每人都肩负重任。
